title: Gujarat Bridge Collapse: 13 Dead
description: Tragedy struck in Gujarat as a bridge collapse claimed 13 lives The incident occurred Wednesday morning near Gambhira village when a section of the four-decade-old Gambhira-Mujpur bridge crumbled causing several vehicles to fall into the Mahisagar river  Two more bodies were recovered Wednesday night bringing the death toll to 13 Five injured individuals are receiving hospital treatment  The collapsed bridge connected central Gujarat to the Saurashtra region The cause of the collapse is under investigation This devastating event highlights the urgent need for infrastructure safety assessments and maintenance  Our thoughts are with the victims families and the injured
